data.name: keto
data.description: Open Source (Go) implementation of "Zanzibar: Google's Consistent, Global Authorization System". Ships gRPC, REST APIs, newSQL, and an easy and granular permission language. Supports ACL, RBAC, and other access models.

data.name: authelia
data.description: The Single Sign-On Multi-Factor portal for web apps

data.name: consoleme
data.description: A Central Control Plane for AWS Permissions and Access

data.name: hydra
data.description: OpenID Certifiedâ„¢ OpenID Connect and OAuth Provider written in Go - cloud native, security-first, open source API security for your infrastructure. SDKs for any language. Compatible with MITREid.

data.name: oauth2-proxy
data.description: A reverse proxy that provides authentication with Google, Github or other providers.

data.name: totp
data.description: RFC6238 TOTP implementation in pure PostgreSQL plpgsql

data.name: paseto
data.description: Platform-Agnostic Security Tokens implementation in GO (Golang)
